articles.description: During the DBFZ World Champion tournament today, Bandai announced that a New Dragon Ball Z: Budokai Tenkaichi Game was finally in development.
articles.content:
The DBFZ World Champion tournament is underway, and while many expected to see some brand-new announcements, nobody expected to see a new Dragon Ball Z: Budokai Tenkaichi game being announced.
